description: The Department of National Defence (DND) Rocky Mountain Cadet Training Centre (RMCTC), located approximately 45 kilometers north of Cochrane, Alberta (AB) has the as-and-when requested requirement for provision of contracted food services.
duration_in_months: . The food service work is split into two streams of service: Stream A is the High Season, on-site Services, and Stream B is the Low Season, on-site or off-site services.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Catering Service - RMCTC

### Solicitation Information
| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Title** | Catering Service - RMCTC |
| **Reference Number** | WS4505872728-Doc4505897232 |
| **Amendment Number** | 1 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4505872728 |
| **Publication Date** | 2024-04-29 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2024-05-17T14:00:00 EDT |
| **Amendment Date** | 2024-05-10 |

### Tender Details
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Limited Tendering Reason**: N/A

### Services Required
The RMCTC, located approximately 45 km north of Cochrane, Alberta, has a requirement for provision of contracted food services. The food service work is divided into two streams:

*   **Stream A: High Season Services**: On-site services at the RMCTC.
*   **Stream B: Low Season Services**: On-site or off-site services.

### Contract Period
The period of the requirement is one year with the option to extend by an additional two one-year periods.

### End User
*   **Department of National Defence (DND)**
*   **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information
*   **Name**: Diane Warnell (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: [diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Important Dates
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-17T14:00:00 EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-06-07
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

### Important Links
